properties.areaDesc: Philadelphia, PA; Montgomery, PA; Chester, PA
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 25 at 6:28PM EST until January 26 at 11:17AM EST by NWS Mount Holly NJ
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Mount Holly NJ has issued a flood warning for
the following rivers in Pennsylvania...

Schuylkill River At Norristown affecting Chester...Montgomery and Philadelphia
Counties

The National Weather Service in Mount Holly NJ has issued a

* Flood Warning for
The Schuylkill River at Norristown.
* until Sunday morning...Or until the warning is cancelled.
* At  5:30 PM Saturday the stage was 12.9 feet.
* Flood stage is 13.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by this evening and continue to rise to near
14.0 feet by after midnight tonight.the river will fall below flood stage by
early tomorrow.
* Impact...At 15.0 feet...River Road in West Conshohocken begins to flood. The
lower garages at the Riverview Landing and the Lofts at Valley Forge start to
take on water. The lower section of Port Indian Road in West Norriton becomes
impassable.
* Flood history...This crest compares to a previous crest of 14.3 feet on Nov 3
2018.
properties.instruction:
SAFETY MESSAGE...Do not attempt to drive through flooded areas. The water may be
deeper than you think.
